title: "Whoopi Goldberg Guest Stars on Life on Mars"
content:
Hi Typophiles.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whoopigoldberg_5293.png)

Looks really familiar. Can't place it. Sadly, don't have the time to go digging around.

Thanks a lot,  
/stephen
author: Stephen Lording

comments.content: Monotype Grotesque Extra Condensed is close, particularly in the uppercase. Placard is similar, too. But neither has that Compacta/Helvetica Compressed "a" or "r".
Hadrian? Haven't heard of that one before. Nice! Thanks a lot, Marc. And yeah, I could find individual letters in a number of faces, but never all in the same one. Well, until now. :)
